name: Employment & Education  ReEngagement (EErE)
description: The Employment & Education reEngagement (EErE) program is a transitional four (4) month employment program for youth and young adults on parole and/or probation. This program provides participants: EErE serves youth ages 14-24. - Job readiness training - Career identification - Case management - Supportive services for employment - Educational placement Contact: Anita Postell - apostell@ycdjobs.org
